PositionHistory.Title: Consultant Sr. Web developer
Consultant Web developer
Asst. Systems Engineer

Competency.name: Maintenance of various databases and executing SQL Queries

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Lakshmi Munukutla is a resident of Jersey city, NJ, US. She has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 10 years. Currently she is employed as a FullTime Sr. Software UI Engineer at Everyday Health Inc. Lakshmi has extensive knowledge of Cascading Style Sheets, JavaScript, Java Server Pages, jQuery, HTML5, Java Servlets, Java, Oracle PL/SQL, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, iOS, XML, UNIX, Spring Framework, IBM WebSphere, HTML, DHTML, SQL, JUnit, ECLiPSe, XSL, XHTML, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, Struts Web Application Framework, SQLite, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, NetBeans, MVC, Log4j, JDBC, Groovy, Framework, Enterprise Java Beans, Document Object Model, AngularJS, AJAX, XSLT, TranSlate, Stored Procedures, SS7, SAX, Perl Programming, Oracle, Netscape Navigator, HLR, DTD, Clarify, C++, Adobe Content Viewer. So far Lakshmi has not gained any managerial experience.
